definition: tough more-or-less rigid protective covering of an animal or plant, to equip with armor
details:
noun
- tough more-or-less rigid protective covering of an animal or plant
= example: tough more-or-less rigid protective covering of an animal or plant
- protective covering made of metal and used in combat
= example: protective covering made of metal and used in combat
- a military unit consisting of armored fighting vehicles
= example: a military unit consisting of armored fighting vehicles
verb
- to equip with armor
= example: to equip with armor
